Desc.entry: An awareness-raising voluntary organisation offering help and advice to young people about the health risks associated with body piercing. Acts as a resource for young people, parents, health professionals and the wider community. Provides advice, assistance, workshops and professional support for practical programmes of educational and other activities around the subject of body piercing. Works in partnership with schools and other agencies.

Pubs.entry: Educational Resource Pack, leaflets, posters, contact cards,
